name: BUSINESS CLASS on WORLDâ€™S SHORTEST A350 Flight *During LOCKDOWN*
description:
Today we're trying a totally one off route onboard Lufthansa's brand new A350! What's more on Business Class, whats its like flying this during the lockdown?

We start the journey today in Krakow Poland flying the CRJ900 over to Munich. From Munich I'll be taking you around Lufthansa's Business Class lounge and then onboard their A350 on the world's shortest routing of it's kind, from Munich to Frankfurt. I'll be taking a look at how service has been adapted onboard for such a short flight and what it's like to fly currently during the pandemic. 

Follow me on IG: will.luxurytravel for live updates on all my First and Business Class travels.

-----------------

Lufthansa A350 Business Class
Lufthansa Airbus A350
Business Class Lufthansa 
Munich to Frankfurt 
A350-900
